pull.title: Fix window title of wallet loading window
pull.body:
Throughout the GUI, the title of the window, tells about the purpose of the window. This was not true for the title of wallet loading wallet.
This PR fixes this issue by renaming the wallet loading window title to 'Open Wallet'

Changes introduced in this PR (Runned Bitcoin-GUI on signet network)

|Master|PR|
|---|---|
|![Screenshot from 2021-08-24 00-02-18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/85434418/130500309-2f0af2c9-55f0-4609-a92b-3156800fa92e.png)|![Screenshot from 2021-09-07 18-19-10](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/85434418/132351394-1ee4a36c-3ba9-4d1a-a8f3-f17804fb856a.png)|

events.body: This will also break the settings in the registry, IIRC

Considering the following

https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/blob/d3203a99d886177eee9d1f9cd8411e215118a4e6/src/qt/bitcoin.cpp#L516

user could end with two installed versions of Bitcoin Core, no?

Approach NACK.

Why not modify `WalletControllerActivity::showProgressDialog`?

Or use [`QGuiApplication::applicationDisplayName`](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qguiapplication.html#applicationDisplayName-prop)? But not sure about the latter...

Updated  from bb7aae1 to abcc83a ([pr409.01](https://github.com/ShaMan239/gui/tree/pr409.01) -> [pr409.02](https://github.com/ShaMan239/gui/tree/pr409.02))
Addressed Comments by @hebasto and @jarolrod.

Changes made:
- Resetted QAPP_APP_NAME variables to their original value
- Changed title of loading window, by updating WalletControllerActivity::showProgressDialog, as suggested by @hebasto and @jarolrod
- Updated PR description accordingly.

~ACK abcc83a71876b6fff4d853392e10a06f0c7a1c38~ (see https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/409#issuecomment-906732323), tested on Linux Mint 20.2 (Qt 5.12.8):

| master | this PR |
|---|---|
| ![Screenshot from 2021-08-26 18-53-43](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/130995330-ded890d8-249b-4eb1-90c8-05173885701d.png) | ![Screenshot from 2021-08-26 18-32-14](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/130995372-05f8fdbb-f97c-48ef-8e20-a0fb0492ec54.png) |

---

@ShaMan239 
Before merging, could you update the PR title and description to describe use cases more precise:

https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/blob/774a4f517cf63df345e6a4852cc0b135b0a9ab76/src/qt/walletcontroller.cpp#L254

https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/blob/774a4f517cf63df345e6a4852cc0b135b0a9ab76/src/qt/walletcontroller.cpp#L349

tACK abcc83a71876b6fff4d853392e10a06f0c7a1c38 tested on macOS 12 and Ubuntu 20.04, thanks for picking up the suggestion! It should be noted that the behavior on master for macOS was a slightly different problem. For macOS on master, there was no window title at all. Now there is one. This is shown in the screenshots below. | Master | PR | | ----------- | ----------- | | | |
Hmm, is this approach consistent with our code base? Consider `git grep -n setWindowTitle`.

> Hmm, is this approach consistent with our code base? Consider `git grep -n setWindowTitle`.

Why isn't it?
https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/blob/b8d45a3c2015568ecc699736bd750f36321d948f/src/qt/utilitydialog.cpp#L41

Here is is essentially the same, just appends more information to `PACKAGE_NAME`
https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/blob/b8d45a3c2015568ecc699736bd750f36321d948f/src/qt/bitcoingui.cpp#L1375-L1387
Concept ACK.

Updated from abcc83a to 58dca474673f190e947db4bd350926f1a3bd592c ([pr409.02](https://github.com/ShaMan239/gui/tree/pr409.02) -> [pr409.03](https://github.com/ShaMan239/gui/tree/pr409.03))
Addressed Comments by @hebasto and @promag. Thanks, @hebasto, for pointing out the problem, and thanks, @promag, for the suggestion.

Changes made:
- Updated the `showProgressDialog` function to accept two arguments.
- Updated all the occurrences of `showProgressDialog` with the new title as “Open Wallet.”

Updated from 58dca47 to d9e421c3ba937fd37529a74dff07dcc6ec1cdc26 ([pr409.03](https://github.com/ShaMan239/gui/tree/pr409.03) -> [pr409.04](https://github.com/ShaMan239/gui/tree/pr409.04))
Addressed @jarolrod comment.

Changes:
- Changed title of Create Wallet loading window from “Open Wallet” to “Create Wallet.”

ACK d9e421c3ba937fd37529a74dff07dcc6ec1cdc26

In commit message maybe
s/"qt: Fix window title of wallet loading window"/"qt: Fix WalletControllerActivity progress dialog title"/
?

Updated from d9e421c to 8e11d89 ([pr409.04](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.04) -> [pr409.05](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.05))
Addressed @hebasto suggestions

Changes:
- Updated commit message to better explain the intent and changes done in this PR.
- Added Translator comments. I would request reviewers to review the comments and provide their valuable suggestions.
ACK 8e11d89ea90be5433905ed207ff9a5a5dbe3e8cb

Updated from 8e11d89ea90be5433905ed207ff9a5a5dbe3e8cb to e4bf5804bdeee2b16d5caea64b97f002d8d625e5 ([pr409.05](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.05) -> [pr409.06](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.06))

Updates:

> Updated from [8e11d89](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/commit/8e11d89ea90be5433905ed207ff9a5a5dbe3e8cb) to [e4bf580](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/commit/e4bf5804bdeee2b16d5caea64b97f002d8d625e5) ([pr409.05](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.05) -> [pr409.06](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.06))

Updated from e4bf5804bdeee2b16d5caea64b97f002d8d625e5 to a086a3757b1edb06b601457142d36628ae15441d ([pr409.06](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.06) -> [pr409.07](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.07))

Changes:
- Corrected the rebasing of PR on the current Master.
- Used “Load Wallet” as the title for the progress window, which is displayed when wallets are being loaded at the startup of GUI.
- Added translator’s comment for the “Load Wallet” progress window accordingly.

@hebasto @jarolrod 
Would you mind reviewing the PR again after the recent commit? Thanks

Updated from a086a37 to ccecfa86a010704ac5247fc637de28e71b3e71b2 ([pr409.07](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.07) -> [pr409.08](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.08))

Addressed @hebasto and @jarolrod comments

Changes:
1. `Load Wallet` -> `Load Wallets`
2. Clang format corrected
3. Separated HTML tags from strings to avoid the risk of error
4. Translator comments have been expanded upon and are now highly descriptive and clear thanks to @jarolrod suggestions
5. Updated commit message to account for changes in PR.
I agree [with hebasto](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/409#discussion_r721674667). The strings shouldn't be broken up. Some languages might need to reorder the sentence.

Updated from ccecfa8 to 9de84f6 ([pr409.08](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.08) -> [pr409.09](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.09))

Changes:

Changes:
1. Corrected a grammatical mistake in the translator's comments.
utACK f86fe193329e057b7c6b624c3b3f11d5ae04826f

Almost there, just need to update one of the translator comments: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/409#discussion_r722860813

events.message:
qt: Fix WalletControllerActivity progress dialog title

The WalletControllerActivity progress dialog had title of "Bitcoin-Qt".
The window title for opening wallet window should be "Open Wallet",
for creating wallet window should be "Create Wallet", and for the window
that is displayed when wallets are being loaded at startup should be
"Load Wallets". This PR fixes that.

events.body:
Updated from f86fe19 to 01bff8f ([pr409.10](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.10) -> [pr409.11](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/tree/pr409.11))

Addressed @jarolrod’s suggestion

Changes:
1. Added the translator’s comment suggestion which was not pushed earlier in the PR.
ACK 01bff8f0494ba1c02c087b7186c892785f326fd9, tested on Linux Mint 20.2 (Qt 5.12.8).

ACK 01bff8f

verified that the only change since my last review is updating the missing translator comment by comparing the pr409.10 and pr409.11 branches: [diff](https://github.com/shaavan/gui/compare/pr409.10..pr409.11)
Thank you very much to everyone who took out time to review this PR. Especially, thanks to @jarolrod and @hebasto for sticking out till last in reviewing this PR and helping in improving it.

comments.body: Search for `setWindowTitle`, typically windows/dialogs use titles. I'd add a `title` argument to `showProgressDialog` and update all call sites, like: ```cpp showProgressDialog(tr("Open Wallet"), tr("Opening Wallet %1…").arg(name.toHtmlEscaped())); ``` which uses the same text as the menu item. Edit: looks like @hebasto already pointed this.

`Create Wallet` is more appropriate than `Open Wallet` here, no? ```suggestion showProgressDialog(tr("Create Wallet"), tr("Creating Wallet %1…").arg(m_create_wallet_dialog->walletName().toHtmlEscaped())); ```
Addressed in  d9e421c. Thanks for pointing that out.
Addressed in  58dca47. Thanks for the suggestion @promag.

nit
> ... which uses the same text as the menu item.

Maybe mention this in the translator comment?

Please fix indentation.

nit: s/"Load Wallet"/"Load Wallets"/ (singular -> plural).

comments.diff_hunk: @@ -231,7 +232,11 @@ void CreateWalletActivity::askPassphrase() void CreateWalletActivity::createWallet() { - showProgressDialog(tr("Creating Wallet %1…").arg(m_create_wallet_dialog->walletName().toHtmlEscaped())); + showProgressDialog( + //: Title of progress window when Create Wallet action is selected. + tr("Create Wallet"), + //: Describing what is being done in background.

@@ -340,7 +349,11 @@ LoadWalletsActivity::LoadWalletsActivity(WalletController* wallet_controller, QW
 
 void LoadWalletsActivity::load()
 {
-    showProgressDialog(tr("Loading wallets…"));
+    showProgressDialog(
+      //: Title of progress window when which is displayed when wallets are being loaded.
+      tr("Load Wallet"),

comments.body: Addressed in ccecfa8

> while here, can we break up the HTML tags from the string to be translated? Keeping these tags as part of the string is error-prone

Why?

![Screenshot from 2021-10-04 22-56-56](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32963518/135916075-502c09bc-32c6-432b-aece-8b120cc6054a.png)

I am now not sure what will be the optimum approach for it. I have updated my PR and joined the HTML tags with the strings for the time being. But I am keeping this unresolved for now, just in case if @jarolrod wants to adds something.

Just to be sure, is the first "when" correct?

```suggestion
        //: Title of progress window which is displayed when wallets are being loaded.
```
?
Oops! It shouldn't have been there. Let me quickly correct it!
Done Corrected! f86fe19
@hebasto is right, transifex does seem to handle this quite nicely so no need
